content: this is a summary of a legal case involving two parties referred to as rb and w the case lasted for 3 years and 6 months and had a cost of €110257 euros the court ruled that both spouses are responsible for paying off the debts they jointly contracted including a loan used to buy maintain and improve a property owned by one of the spouses the court determined that the entire loan amount is considered joint property requiring compensation from the other spouses personal assets in a specific case where one spouse used a loan to finance the acquisition of a property the court ruled that the plaintiff must compensate the defendant for 45ths of the current value of the property rejecting the argument that the portion of the loan already repaid should be considered compensation the courts decision is based on articles 1432 and 1435 of the civil code the case was initially heard in the antwerp court of appeal and later referred to the third chamber the court dismissed the appeal and ordered the plaintiff to pay costs the judgment was delivered by the brussels court of cassation on september 7 2020
